title: Provided that, it shall not bar the return of the possession of such open space to the original society / association of plot owners, after taking due undertaking to that effect
clause_text: Provided that, it shall not bar the return of the possession of such open space to the original society / association of plot owners, after taking due undertaking to that effect.
